name: Joe Hound
description:
Joe Hound - The inter-dimensional being with a spectacular mustache and an intense coffee addiction, travels from dimension to dimension hunting down the best cups of java that the multiverse has to offer.

Help Joe steal as much coffee as you can before getting caught by the police.

A game made by me, Tom Gill and Phil Newberry :) very rough around the edges, but we had great fun making it together over the course of 48 hours (no game jam, we just wanted to do it) and we aim to update and improve it in the near future.
